The '''needle trap''' is a mechanical [[trap]] which fires poisoned [[needle]]s when stepped upon by a player or [[monster]]. They can fire 3-11 times before running out of ammo, and inflict a mild amount of [[poison]] on anyone who steps on it.

A source of [[Repel Missiles#Player sources|Repel Missiles]] reduces the chance of this trap being able to hit the player.

==History==
*In [[0.24]], needle traps were replaced with [[dart trap]]s.
*Prior to [[0.15]], stepping on a needle trap would generate a single poisoned needle ammunition.
*Earlier versions could hold non-poisoned needles.
